name: Doug - Pre Alpha Test
description:
Doug is a top-down chaotic shooter developed with GMS2, which is currently in the Pre-Alpha development phase.

The version of the game currently available for anyone to download is a simple demonstration on the state of the game

DOWNLOAD IS AVAILABLE BELOW:

If you do not wish to play the game, then feel free to watch the video of Doug - Pre-Alpha Test below:

Feedback on the game is greatly appreciated!

================

CONTROLS:

'WASD' Keys - Movement

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

'Enter' Key - Drop Equipped Weapon

'O' Key - Toggle Screenshake
